overview: Sami Kafati dies (1996) leaving unfinished the first Honduran fiction feature, "No hay tierra sin dueño". His son Ramsés and Chilean editor Carmen Brito finish the film. This documentary reconstructs the years that Kafati dedicated to making possible a Honduran feature, which 7 years after his death finally arrives at Cannes (2003).
title: Corazón abierto
